typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SalesAmount as double,
		TotalProductCost as double,
		ProductStandardCost as double,
		UnitPriceDiscountPct as boolean,
		ExtendedAmount as double,
		UnitPrice as double,
		OrderQuantity as short,
		SalesTerritoryId as short,
		OrderDate as date,
		ProductId as short,
		SalesOrderLineId as integer,
		Channel as string,
		SalesOrder as string,
		CustomerId as string,
		ResellerId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworks',
	tableName: 'Sales',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> SalesSource
source(output(
		CustomerId as string,
		Customer as string,
		ChannelKey as long,
		GeographyKey as long,
		CustomerKey as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'DimCustomer',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> DimCustomerSource
source(output(
		Channel as string,
		ChannelCategory as string,
		ChannelKey as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'DimChannel') ~> DimChannelSource
source(output(
		ProductId as short,
		Category as string,
		Subcategory as string,
		Model as string,
		ListPrice as double,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as double,
		Product as string,
		SKU as string,
		ProductKey as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'DimProduct') ~> DimProductSource
split1@InternetCustomers select(mapColumn(
		CustomerId_lookup = CustomerId,
		CustomerKey,
		ChannelKey,
		ChannelCategory
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> InternetCustomerSelect
DimChannelSource select(mapColumn(
		Channel_lookup = Channel,
		ChannelKey,
		ChannelCategory
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimChannelSelect
InternetCustomerFilter, InternetCustomerSelect lookup(CustomerId == CustomerId_lookup,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InternetCustomerKeyLookup
ResellerFilter, ResellerCustomerSelect lookup(ResellerId == ResellerId_lookup,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ResellerKeyLookup
ProductKeyLookup select(mapColumn(
		ProductId = DimProductSelect@ProductId,
		ProductKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
DimProductSource select(mapColumn(
		ProductId,
		ProductKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimProductSelect
select2, DimProductSelect lookup(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == DimProductSelect@ProductId,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ProductKeyLookup
DimCustomerSourceSplitSelect split(ChannelCategory=='Internet',
	disjoint: false) ~> split1@(InternetCustomers, ResellerCustomers)
DimCustomerSource, DimChannelSelect lookup(DimCustomerSource@ChannelKey == DimChannelSelect@ChannelKey,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ChannelType
ChannelType select(mapColumn(
		CustomerId,
		CustomerKey,
		ChannelKey = DimChannelSelect@ChannelKey,
		ChannelCategory
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimCustomerSourceSplitSelect
split1@ResellerCustomers select(mapColumn(
		ResellerId_lookup = CustomerId,
		CustomerKey,
		ChannelKey,
		ChannelCategory
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ResellerCustomerSelect
ResellerKeyLookup, InternetCustomerKeyLookup union(byName: true)~> CustomerLookupUnion
CustomerLookupUnion select(mapColumn(
		SalesAmount,
		TotalProductCost,
		ProductStandardCost,
		UnitPriceDiscountPct,
		ExtendedAmount,
		UnitPrice,
		OrderQuantity,
		SalesTerritoryId,
		OrderDate,
		ProductId,
		SalesOrderLineId,
		Channel,
		SalesOrder,
		CustomerId,
		ResellerId,
		ResellerId_lookup,
		CustomerKey,
		ChannelKey,
		ChannelCategory,
		CustomerId_lookup
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select2
SalesSource filter(isNull(ResellerId)) ~> InternetCustomerFilter
SalesSource filter(isNull(CustomerId)) ~> ResellerFilter
select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'FactSales',
	recreate:true,
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> FactSalesSink
